greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle read by rows where T(n,k) is the number of unlabeled connected graphs with loops with n edges and k vertices, 1 <= k <= n+1.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1325
example: Non-isomorphic representatives of the graphs counted in row 4:
program: InvEulerMT(u)={my(n=#u, p=log(1+x*Ser(u)), vars=variables(p)); Vec(sum(i=1, n, moebius(i)*substvec(p + O(x*x^(n\i)), vars, apply(v->v^i, vars))/i) )}
edges(v,t) = {prod(i=2, #v, prod(j=1, i-1, my(g=gcd(v[i],v[j])); t(v[i]*v[j]/g)^g )) * prod(i=1, #v, my(c=v[i]); t(c)^((c+1)\2)*if(c%2, 1, t(c/2)))}
T(n)={Mat([Col(p+O(y^n), -n) | p<-InvEulerMT(vector(n, k, G(k, y + O(y^n))))])}
xref: Row sums are A191970. Last column is A000055.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 26 2018
ext: Terms a(28) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Oct 22 2019
